ComicInfo.Title: The Curse of the Crimson Corsair: The Evil That Men Do...! Part Four; No Illusion
ComicInfo.Summary:
Laurie's on the worst trip of her lifeâ€”dosed against her will by a counterculture guru with a criminal agenda! What's worse, her beloved new friends can't seem to see the dark future they're barreling straight into.
